title: Womens Wide Leg Jeans High Waisted Straight Leg Stretchy Baggy Trendy Casual Denim Pants with Pockets
description: Unique Design: The stretchy jeans for women design with high rise, wide leg, loose fitzipper and basic five pockets. A good pattern can fit most body types and make you look stylish. The loose trouser legs can play a role in modifying the shape of legs and elongating the height.
Comfortable jeans: Our high waisted jeans are made of soft, breathable stretch denim, which means they may feel comfortable at first, but the more you wear them, the more comfortable they will be.

Stylish and Versatile: The wide leg jeans women are a must-have item in every woman's fashionable wardrobe. They can be easily paired with everything from casual T-shirts to trendy blouses, and from daily sneakers to high heels.

Occasions: The womens jeans are suitable for a variety of occasions to wear, casual, going out,office,holiday,daily wear, travel, and shopping. No matter where you go, you will look stylish in our trendy jeans.

Warm Tips: Our baggy jeans run true to standard US sizes. Size X-small fits size 0 - 2, size Small fits size 4 - 6, size Medium fits size 8 - 10, size Large fits size 12 - 14, size X-Large fits size 14 - 16, size XX-Large fits size 16 - 18.
